Seven Star Password Removal Service

MODELS: Apple Macbook, Macbook Pro, Macbook Air, Mac mini

We offer password bypass for both user-set and UFI Apple Password locks that will permanently wipe the EFI firmware and ICloud System Pin Code Lock and restore to it's default state. Through such measures, the Mac will disappear from the owner ICloud user account forever. You will not have to worry about being tracked by the original order through apps such as Find My IPhone.

We offer a life-time warranty that guaranteeds your product will never come back locked.

NOTE: For Macbook Pro Models 2010 - 2011, we will have to take out the motherboard in order to unlock it. Thus,it would be recommended if you can take it out in advance to save time during servicing.
